dbPr.connection: Provider=SQLOLEDB.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Persist Security Info=True;Initial Catalog=Divisions_Inc_MSCRM;Data Source=DIVSQL3\CRM;Use Procedure for Prepare=1;Auto Translate=True;Packet Size=4096;Workstation ID=WFALK-DESKTOP;Use Encryption for Data=False;Tag with column collation when possible=False
dbPr.command: -- add comment_x000d__x000a_select accountid, name, accountnumber, new_gpid_x000d__x000a_from account_x000d__x000a_where statuscode = 1_x000d__x000a_and deletionstatecode = 0_x000d__x000a_and coalesce(accountnumber, 'NULL') <> coalesce(new_gpid, 'NULL')
